name: Sea Bass Salad
description: Grilled sea bass fillet served with a mix of green salads, cucumber, tomatoes, pumpkin seeds, and pistachios, topped with a citrus-basil dressing.

name: Salmon and Quinoa Salad
description: Salmon marinated in beet juice, served with a mix of green salads, avocado, edamame, and a honey-Dijon mustard dressing.

name: Cucumber Gazpacho
description: Chilled cucumber soup with vegetable salsa.

name: Cheese and Watermelon Salad
description: Light salad with a mix of green salads, red onion, and refreshing citrus yuzu dressing.
